control.visible: Window.IsActive(MovieInformation) | Window.IsActive(MusicInformation) | Window.IsActive(SongInformation) | Window.IsActive(FileBrowser) | Window.IsActive(TextViewer) | Window.IsActive(AddonSettings) | Window.IsActive(ContentSettings) | Window.IsActive(SelectDialog) | Window.IsActive(FileStackingDialog) | Window.IsActive(MediaSource) | Window.IsActive(PictureInfo) | Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) | Window.IsActive(VirtualKeyboard) | Window.IsActive(NumericInput) | Window.IsActive(ProfileSettings) | Window.IsActive(LockSettings) | Window.IsActive(SmartPlaylistEditor) | Window.IsActive(SmartPlaylistRule) | Window.IsActive(script-RSS_Editor-rssEditor.xml) | Window.IsActive(script-RSS_Editor-setEditor.xml) | Window.IsActive(AddonInformation) | Window.IsActive(Peripherals) | Window.IsActive(PeripheralSettings) | Window.IsActive(script-cu-lrclyrics-main.xml) | Window.IsActive(PVRChannelManager) | Window.IsActive(MediaFilter)

include.name: FloorReturnButtons
include.control:
280r 55r 50 50 rightalign> horizontal WindowOpen WindowClose
Trailer Button 45 45 PlayMedia("$INFO[ListItem.Trailer]") FloorButtons/FloorTrailerFO.png FloorButtons/FloorTrailerNF.png !Skin.HasSetting(HideTrailerBtn) !Player.HasMedia + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer) !Container.Content(TVShows) + !Container.Content(Seasons) + !Container.Content(Episodes) ![Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(732)] Skin.HasSetting(EnableFloorReturnButtons)
Volume Up Button 45 45 $VAR[VolumeStepUp] VolumeUp FloorButtons/FloorVolPlusFO.png FloorButtons/FloorVolPlusNF.png Skin.HasSetting(EnableVolumeButtons) Skin.HasSetting(EnableFloorReturnButtons)
Volume Down Button 45 45 $VAR[VolumeStepDown] VolumeDown FloorButtons/FloorVolMinusFO.png FloorButtons/FloorVolMinusNF.png Skin.HasSetting(EnableVolumeButtons) Skin.HasSetting(EnableFloorReturnButtons)
Back push button 45 45 back FloorButtons/FloorBackFO.png FloorButtons/FloorBackNF.png Skin.HasSetting(EnableFloorReturnButtons)
Home push button 45 45 Dialog.Close(all,true) ActivateWindow(home) FloorButtons/FloorHomeFO.png FloorButtons/FloorHomeNF.png Skin.HasSetting(EnableFloorReturnButtons)

control.description: Fake Button to fix Player Controls Navigation

include.name: MenuVideoNodeListCheck
include.visible: !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.1.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.1.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.1) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.2.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.2.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.2) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.3.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.3.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.3) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.4.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.4.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.4) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.5.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.5.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.5) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.6.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.6.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.6) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.7.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.7.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.7) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.8.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.8.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.8) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.9.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.9.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.9) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.10.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.10.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.10) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.10.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.11.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.11) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(HomeItem.10.Playlist)) + Skin.String(HomeItem.12.Type,VideoNode) + StringCompare(Window(home).Property(UsrSelectBtn),HomeItem.12)
